thread.title: Weekend in London
thread.title_full: Weekend in London - Review of Radisson Blu Edwardian Vanderbilt, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Isabelle C
title: Weekend in London
text: We spent 2 nights in your hotel. Nothing negative to say. It was just perfect. Clean and confortable room and b/room. Excellent breakfast. Very professional and friendly staff ! Keep on the good work. We are coming back for Easter holidays. Looking forward in staying there again!
